backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a messaging system with CRUD operations for messages that include text, images, and videos, using blob storage mixin and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old message records (without image/video fields) to new message records by adding null image and video fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features for image and video upload, display, and data handling across MessageInput, MessageList, and useMessages components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the messaging app's component structure, hooks, and styling with image/video support.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with teal/cyan-based palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the alatele2 application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing username session state and conditionally rendering UsernameEntry or MessagingInterface with logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying alpha logo, app name, current username, and logout button with sticky positioning.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input form with textarea, image/video file upload with preview, progress tracking, and ExternalBlob conversion for sending attachments.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Message list component rendering chat messages with avatars, timestamps, inline image/video display with dialogs, and edit/delete controls for own messages.
frontend/src/components/MessagingInterfa: Main messaging interface component that orchestrates the Header, MessageList, and MessageInput components, handles message sending with text/image/video support, auto-scrolls to new messages, and displays a loading spinner while fetching.
frontend/src/components/UsernameEntry.ts: Username entry form component that displays a card with logo and input field, allowing users to enter a username (max 30 chars) before joining the chat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: React Query hooks for message operations including fetching all messages (filtered to exclude subscription prompts), sending messages with optional image/video attachments, deleting messages, and editing message content.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for colors, borders, and chart styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names with proper conflict resolution.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, custom animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document showing completed features for image/video upload UI and pending backend requirements to extend Message type and API for media file storage.
